Camera.Triple:: 200 MP, f/1.9, (wide), 1/1.4", 0.56µm, PDAF, OIS 50 MP, f/2.4, (periscope telephoto), 1/2.51", 0.7µm, PDAF, OIS, 3x optical zoom 12 MP, f/2.2, 117˚ (ultrawide), AF

Design.Others:: IP68/IP69 dust tight and water resistant (high pressure water jets; immersible up to 1.5m for 30 min)

Battery.Charging:: 80W wired 50W wireless, 28% in 15 min 5W reverse wired Reverse wireless

Hardware.CPU:: Octa-core (2x4.32 GHz Oryon V2 Phoenix L + 6x3.53 GHz Oryon V2 Phoenix M)

Connectivity & Features.Bluetooth:: 5.4, A2DP, LE, aptX HD, aptX Adaptive
Connectivity & Features.GPS:: GPS (L1+L5), BDS (B1I+B1C+B2a+B2b), GALILEO (E1+E5a+E5b), QZSS (L1+L5), NavIC (L5), GLONASS
Connectivity & Features.Sensors:: Fingerprint (under display, ultrasonic), accelerometer, gyro, proximity, compass
